name: That One Sandbox Game
description:
A new Sandbox Game where the Main Goal is Physics.

Most Objects have Special Properties!

Controls:

Click to Drag Items

Right Click  while dragging to stop Rotation

Drag Items into the Trash to remove them or press R (You can also remove all objects from the menu)

Questions:

Is the Game Moddable? Maybe, I Don't fully understand how to Mod a Game but There is a Possibility using Melon Loader.

What do I do in the Game? Choose from the many Items that you can Spawn, and throw, Build, or make Trickshots.

Will There be more Updates? and when? Yes but I Can't Really Pin Point a Time But Maybe Soon.

Please Remember This Game is In Beta, Bugs are Expected!
